1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

b83c9aceef9577eaada5cfd78bc7b2cd04a176d1.commitMessage: Simplified the code by removing HeaderInfo classes, they were introduced to avoid code duplication between header checks in two separate inheritance trees (Java Check vs. FileSetCheck). Now that we have only FileSetChecks as Header checks, this delegation is no longer necessary.

6f1f7bd3fdcca84404e97964b3e48de6db5024ec.commitMessage:
Added CrossLanguageRegexpHeaderCheck. This involved some refactorings to avoid duplicate code, so lots of files are affected
- moved AbstractHeaderCheck to header package
- moved file extension filtering code to Utils, so it's available not only from FileSetChecks
- moved regexp header checking logic to RegexpHeaderChecker bean
- moved check initialization logic and parameter checking to HeaderInfo classes

aca96ae1b180a8036cc23e93840c4161ae8f8927.commitMessage:
moved header checks to their own package
removed duplicate usage documentation in javadoc along the way

0340dcb26d5db9625e8e1f093f39165b8bdb18bf.commitMessage: Added multiLines property for RegexpHeaderCheck. Added AbstractHeaderCheck - superclass for header checks.
